data.text: Kuya, Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Pfitsolawila ghendo ipfinu ipfimuhonza imunu atende nzambi, lekeni katsoghaya imunu yula yatsotenda pfilawile.
Ing'awile ng'apfu kwe imunu ayo yohighwe libwe lya kusaghila msingo na yasighwe mne ibahali, kubita kumtenda yumwe we iwadodo wano atende nzambi.
Mwalangitse! Ka ndughu yako kakutendela ghehile, umlonge, ang'atoghola totso lyake, umlekelele.
Ang'akutendela ghehile mala saba kwa tsuwa limwe, na ang'akutsila mala saba na kukulongela, ‘Nileka,’ naghwe mlekelele.”
Iwatumighwa wamlongela Imtwatsa, “Utwongetsele ukutoghola.”
Imtwatsa kalonga, “Ukutoghola kwenu kung'awile kudodo ka imbeghu ya haladali, mng'adahile kughulongela mbiki ghuno ghwa mkuyu; ‘Ng'oka, wikehande mwibahali!’ naghwo ghung'awahulikitse.”
“Tulonge yumwe wenu kana imtumwa iyolima kumghunda au iyodima iwang'olo. Apfi hayakuya kulawa kumghunda, katsomlongela imtumwa ayo, ‘Utse tanu, ukale hasi, uje ichijo?’
Bae! Katsomlongela, ‘Nyambikile ichijo, na wanduse kunisang'anila mbaka hanitsomalitsa kuja na kunwa, kuya naghwe uje na unwe!’
Apfi kutsomlongela mighede imtumwa ayo kwaapfila katenda aghala ghalaghitsighwe?
Pfipfila namwe mng'amalitsa kutenda chila chinu chambamighwe kutenda, mwobamighwa kulonga, ‘Twetwe twa iwatumwa iwali si chinu bae. Tutenda pfatubamighwa kutenda.’ ”
Yesu hang'ali kamnzila koghenda Yerusalemu, kabitila mghati mwa Samariya na Galilaya.
Hang'ali yakwingila mne ichijiji chimwe, tsaketingana ne iwakoma kumi, wema kutali.
Wakemelela, “Yesu, Imtwatsa, twonele libatsi!”
Hawonile kawalongela, “Mghende mkelanguse kwa wakulu we inambiko.” Hawang'ali woghenda, tsawahona.
Yumwe mna wawo honile kahona, koya kuchughu, aku komtunya Imulungu kwa kukemelela.
Keghwisa hasi hane maghulu gha Yesu kamlongela mighede. Ayo tsakakala Msamariya.
Yesu kalonga, “Apfi si iwanu kumi bae iwahonile? Lelo awala tisa walikwani?
Ng'oneke yungi iyoyile na kumtunya Imulungu ila imhenza ayu aliyeka?”
Kuya Yesu kamlongela imunu ayo, “Winuke uke, Ukutoghola kwako kukuhonetsa!”
Mafarisayo hawamghutsile Yesu, Undewa we Imulungu utsakutsa tsuwachi, kawedika, “Undewa we Imulungu ng'aukutsa kwa kwoneka kwa tsinenge bae.
Kuduhu imunu iyatsodaha kulonga, ‘Wa hano au wa hala.’ Kwaapfila Undewa we Imulungu wa mghati mwenu.”
Kuya kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Ghamatsuwa ghakutsa mtsobama kwona litsuwa limwe lya ghamatsuwa ghe Imwana we Imunu, lekeni ng'amtsolyona bae.
Na iwanu watsowalongela, ‘Mlole, kahala!’ Au ‘Mlole kahano!’ Lekeni mwemwe mleke kuwawinza.
Kwaapfila ka lumwesa pfalulawila kulanga na kumwemwesa ubali umwe mbaka ubali ungi, apfo pfipfo Imwana we Imunu pfatsakuwa mne litsuwa lyake.
Lekeni tanu yadununzike ng'ani na kulemighwa ne iwanu wa mweleko ghuno.
Na ka pfaiwile mne ghamatsuwa gha Nuhu, pfipfila itsakuwa pfipfo mne ghamatsuwa ghe Imwana we Imunu.
Iwanu tsawaghendelela kuja na kunwa, kukwela na kukwelighwa mbaka Nuhu hengile mne safina. Kuya mafuriko ghatsa na kuwakoma wose.
Itsakuwa pfipfo ka pfailawile mne ghamatsuwa gha Lutu. Iwanu tsawaghendelela kuja na kunwa, kughula na kuutsa, kuhanda tsimbeghu na kutsenga.
Lekeni litsuwa lila Lutu hokile Sodoma, ghumoto na ghamabwe igholakatsa ghalaghala hasi kulawa kulanga na kuwalakatsa wose.
Itsakuwa pfipfo mne litsuwa lila Imwana we Imunu hatsoghubulighwa.”
“Mna litsuwa alyo, imunu iyali mchiswili aku ipfinu pfake pfa mng'anda, aleke kuhulumka kupfisola, pfipfila iyali kumghunda aleke kuya kuchughu.
Mkumbuke ighampatile mwehe wa Lutu.
Imunu wowose iyobama kuukombola ughima wake katsowaghisa, na wowose iyowaghisa ughima wake, katsoukombola.
Nowalongela, litsuwa alyo nechilo iwanu weli watsowasa hamwe, yumwe katsosolighwa na yungi katsolekighwa.”
Iwapinga weli watsotwanga hamwe, yumwe katsosolighwa na yungi katsolekighwa.
Iwanu weli watsakuwa kumghunda, yumwe katsosolighwa, na yungi katsolekighwa.
Baho iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa, “Kwani Mtwatsa?”
